titleStmt.title: Hugh Mosher Estate Quitclaim to William Champlin: a digital transcription

publicationStmt.p: Christopher A. Mosher, Shelton, CT, USA, 2018.

sourceDesc.bibl: Town of Westerly (Rhode Island, USA), Town Records, Land Evidence, Town of Westerly, vol. 2 (1707–1717): stamped spread no. 143, quitclaim deed, John and James Mosher to William Champlin, recorded 4 Jun 1714; digital images, Land evidence [Westerly, Rhode Island] vol. 1–3 1661–1728, FHL microfilm 940,222, DGS 7896694, item 5, image 618 of 911.

body.ab:
know all men by these presents that wee Iohn mosure & Iames mosure
both of the towne of dartmouth in þethe county of bristoll in porince of the
masachusets bay in new england being sons of hugh moser of saide
dartmouth of late desceasd &c. know yee that for and in considration
of the sum of fiue pounds of current mony of sd new England allrea
dy Receiued and to us in hand well & truly paid by william champlin of
the towne of westerle in the collony of Rhoad island and priuidence planta
tions in new England the Receipt of which said sum of fiue pounds wee
doe owne and acknowlidg our selues to be therwith fully satisfied contented
and paid and of Euery part and parcell therof doe acquitt Exonerate
& discharg the sd william champlin his heires Executors and administr
ators by these : wee haue therfore giuen granted surrendered
up and by these giue grant surendred up and quit all our
claime in & to all the undeuided land which was our fathers Hugh
mosher Deseased of late as aboue sd which now belongs to us in that
trakt of land which was purchised of capt soso in squamacutt in the
Towne of westerly in the collony of Rhoad island as aboue sd which our
sd father hugh mosher was a purchiser: from us our heires Executors
& administrators unto sd william champlin his heires Executors —
administrators & assignes for euer and wee the sd Iohn mosher & Iames
moshure Doe farther quitt claime & giue up all our rights in all
seader swamps meadows & other swamps & preuelidgs & apurtnances
what so euer that is in the aboue sd purches that belonge to us from
us our heires Executors & administrators unto the said william cham
plin his heires Executors administrators & assignes for Euer & by these
in witnes wherof and all & singuler herein contained wee the
sd Iohn moshure & the said Iames mosure haue here unto sett out
hands & seales
the second day of Iune in the year of our Lord one
thousand seuen hundred & fourteene and in
the thirteenth year
of her majesties Reigne
&cr ⁓ ⁓ ⁓ ⁓ ⁓ ⁓
the mark of Iohn X mosher seal
Iames mosher seal

signed sealed & deleuered
In the presence of
the mark of Sarah S R Richmond
Edwd Richmond

bristoll ss the aboue named Iohn mosher & Iames mosher
both personally appearing befor me the subscriber & ackn
owledged this aboue written instrument to be their free
actt & deed this
second day of Iune annoque domini 1714
Tho: Church: I: P:

This is a tru copy of oregnll
Entred
4th: day of Iune 1714
by Jno babcock town Cll
